comments.body:
This errors for 2 reasons.

First, the `| {}` causes an error because the compiler (correctly) thinks there might not be a `then` it can access.

Second, even if the `| {}` is somehow erased, the `DebugPromiseLike` itself fails to be usable as a `PromiseLike` because of the type of the _second_ argument.

The only purpose of `act`'s return value (currently) is to catch misuses.

If someday it returns usable `PromiseLike`s we can add a higher priority overload or change the return type.
